description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Tokyo, Japan. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Timeless Tokyo Luxury: Akasaka Escape near Ginza with Daily Breakfast & Club Lounge Upgrades Available
hotels.description: In one of Japan’s most sought-after locations - offering easy access to the iconic districts of Ginza, Shibuya and Shinjuku - ANA InterContinental Tokyo is your gateway to the capital. Its prestige extends beyond the address, with 13 onsite restaurants and bars, newly renovated interiors and the recently expanded Club InterContinental Lounge. After days spent tracing the tempo of Tokyo, retreat to your luxurious room, where sweeping skyline views stretch beyond floor-to-ceiling windows. When it’s time to dine, you won’t need to go far - savour Japanese and international favourites at Cascade Cafe, sizzling plates at the sky-high Teppanyaki Akasaka or refined Cantonese delights at Karin Chinese Restaurant. Explore the hotel’s suite of freshly updated five-star facilities - perhaps a treatment at THANN Sanctuary Spa Akasaka or a workout in the fitness centre. Then hop on a train and 20 minutes later you’re plunged into Shinjuku’s dazzling neon glow, towering skyscrapers and izakaya-lined streets.

hotels.title: Stylish Tokyo Escape near Imperial Palace with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Presenting a striking silhouette, this hotel features modern glass and steel architecture that rises elegantly above the cityscape. Inside, contemporary Japanese design blends with classic European flair, most notably at La Scène restaurant. Here, you'll find lavish international cuisine crafted from seasonal ingredients, all rooted in refined French culinary techniques. Step outside and you're perfectly positioned to explore the very best of Tokyo. The Imperial Palace gardens and the upscale Ginza shopping district are a leisurely stroll away. With several subway lines nearby, it's an ideal base to experience everything from the traditional charm of Asakusa to the lively nightlife of Roppongi, the beating heart of Tokyo's entertainment hub.

hotels.vendor_name: HOTEL GROOVE SHINJUKU, A PARKROYAL Hotel
hotels.title: Contemporary Tokyo Escape in Shinjuku City with Rooftop Terrace
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant pulse of Tokyo with a stay at Hotel Groove Shinjuku, A PARKROYAL Hotel, a stylish retreat in the heart of the city's bustling entertainment district. Moments from the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden, the famous Robot Restaurant, and Shinuuki Station, this contemporary hotel offers the perfect base for urban exploration. After a day of discovery, savour authentic Japanese cuisine at the onsite restaurant, or head to the hotel's chic bar for an expertly crafted cocktail.

hotels.title: Tokyo City Centre Luxury with Spa, Bars & Club Lounge Access
hotels.description: Step into a world of sophisticated Japanese omotenashi, or hospitality, with a sojourn at the BELLUSTAR TOKYO, A Pan Pacific Hotel, a minimalistic retreat in the heart of the city. Savour the exquisite flavours of Japan at Teppan Ten-yu, where skilled chefs create your meal in front of you, and indulge in melt-in-your-mouth fresh sushi at JIN-È, where the nigiri is served with the finest sake. With club lounge access included in your stay, everything is taken care of. Spend an evening bar-hopping around Shinjuku's famous drinking districts, finishing with a crisp nightcap at the hotel's own Bellustar Bar. Easily explore the buzzing capital city with its subway network at your doorstep, or take a moment to yourself with a tranquil treatment at Spa Sunya.

hotels.title: Vibrant Tokyo Escape with Impressive Bay Views
hotels.description: Take in panoramic views of the twinkling Tokyo skyline with a superb stay at the contemporary InterContinental Tokyo Bay, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned just moments from the water's edge. Indulge in decadent cuisine at any of the six luxe restaurants with each one offering a unique fusion of global flavours. Then, venture out to the bustling streets of Japan's vibrant capital where iconic landmarks like the Tokyo Skytree, the Zōjō-ji Temple, and the verdant Kyu Shiba Rikyu Garden await.

hotels.title: Five-Star Tokyo InterContinental Elegance with World-Class Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience high-end opulence and Japanese elegance at the lavish InterContinental - ANA Tokyo, an IHG Hotel, ideally located within walking distance of Tokyo Tower and the Imperial Palace. Elegantly appointed, this five-star property defines grandeur with its dining options, with 12 distinct restaurants, bars and lounges. When not drinking and dining, relax in the seasonal open-air swimming pool, work up a sweat in the fitness centre or find peace among the bright city lights at THANN Sanctuary Spa.

hotels.title: Chic Pullman Tokyo Urban Retreat near Tamachi Station with High-End Restaurant & Rooftop Bar
hotels.description: Embodying the fine fusion of traditional Japanese aesthetics and modern elegance, this creatively designed sanctuary boasts a prime location in the vibrant Minato City district, a short stroll from the JR Yamanote Line at Tamachi Station. Relax and unwind in the plush rooms, delight in sophisticated fine-dining at the all-day fusion restaurant Kasa and sip on delicious cocktails made from homemade syrups and cordials at the rooftop Platform 9 Bar. If you're looking to explore, this abode acts as the perfect launchpad, with a glass walkway leading you directly to the train station, making every corner of Tokyo easily accessible. Plus, in the Tamachi neighbourhood, you will find authentic izakayas (Japanese pubs), noodle shops and boutiques to explore.

hotels.title: Five-Star Tokyo Heritage-Inspired Elegance with Five Restaurants & Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Experience the best of Japanese beauty, elegance and old-world charm with an escape to The Okura Tokyo. Set across two soaring towers, this reimagined hotel features countless design details that have been painstakingly recreated to evoke the architecture of the original hotel of 1962. Its iconic hexagonal pendant lamps, geometric carpets, immaculately maintained flower arrangements, intricate hinoki wood panels and interior designs by Yoshio Taniguchi - the son of the original architect - all magically echo its past glory. Delivering the highest quality, five-star ‘omotenashi’ (the art of Japanese service), this sleek and sophisticated sanctuary is both the place to be seen and to escape the bustle of the city. Nestled close to the affluent Akasaka region, just a short walk from renowned dining and entertainment establishments and traditional architecture, this boutique luxury hotel enjoys premier access to one of the coolest neighbourhoods in Tokyo. For those looking to stay inside, there are several restaurants and bars, a fitness centre overlooking the city skyline, a traditional tea ceremony room, a spa, Japenese-style baths and a heated indoor pool on the 27th floor.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Mandarin Oriental Stay with Tokyo Skytree Views & Michelin-Starred Tapas Bar
hotels.description: Set in Tokyo's prestigious financial district, the five-star Mandarin Oriental, Tokyo is designed to dazzle with Tokyo Skytree views and a revitalising 37th-floor spa, with a one-way window offering glittering city vistas. With a staggering 12 restaurants and bars, the first Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group property in Japan sets the standard with a dining experience to suit every taste, including fine dining at Tapas Molecular Bar, masterful traditional fare at Sushi Shin by Miyakawa and refreshing cocktails at the stylish Mandarin Bar. Between adventures, be sure to visit the tranquil in-house Spa at Mandarin Oriental, Tokyo, with the same sky-high altitude and views to remember as the sauna.

hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya, an IHG Hotel
hotels.title: Vibrant Tokyo Stay Near the Famous Shibuya Crossing
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the dynamic energy of Hotel Indigo Tokyo Shibuya, an IHG Hotel. Guests will experience a vibrant city-stay nestled amidst premier retail, dining, and cultural gems. Find yourself enveloped by local artwork at the onsite international restaurant or bask in the fun Shibuya vibes on the inviting outdoor terrace. Beyond your base, embrace the bustling Shibuya Crossing and The Statue of Hachiko, mere moments from your doorstep.

hotels.title: Five-Star Tokyo Glamour with Four Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience refined Japanese elegance at the opulent The Strings by InterContinental Tokyo, an IHG Hotel, ideally located in the heart of the vibrant Shinagawa district. This lavish hotel soars high above the city and offers four exquisite dining options - including a lively cafe and bar on the 26th floor - and an energizing fitness centre. When you're ready to explore, find yourself just across the road from Shinagawa Station, which provides easy access to central Tokyo.

hotels.title: Five-Star Shangri-La Tokyo Escape near the Imperial Palace
hotels.description: Delve into the pulsating, neon-lit nightlife of Japan’s electric capital with a lavish stay at Shangri-La Hotel, Tokyo. Located in the heart of Marunouchi, home to the iconic Imperial Palace and central Toyko station, this five-star retreat is perfectly placed for Tokyo discovery. Spend your days exploring the markets and restaurants on your doorstep or venture further afield with the help of the convenient subway station located adjacent to the hotel. Then return to the Shangri-La five-star comfort and signature luxe amenities, including three restaurants and a bar, a spa offering a range of calming holistic treatments, and a fitness centre with state-of-the-art gym equipment, indoor pool, jacuzzi and sauna.

hotels.title: Contemporary Tokyo Escape near Airport with Traditional Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Discover Tokyo's dynamic vibe and captivating history with a stay at this conveniently located hotel near Haneda Airport. Fascinate yourself with the contemporary yet traditional designs throughout the property as you make your way to the onsite restaurant for a tryst with local flavours. Say cheers with delicious concoctions at the bar or enjoy snacks in the comfort of your elegant and travel-inspired room. Venture out to explore the vibrant Ota City, home to the famous Senzokuike Park and Omori Nori Museum. An ideal location and a balanced mix of old and new make for a restful stay with Tokyo's wonders at your fingertips.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Tokyo Shinjuku Stay Near Yoyogi Park
hotels.description: Take the bullet train to adventure with a stay at Kimpton Shinjuku Tokyo, an IHG Hotel, just four minutes from Shinjuku Station. Surrounded by Shinjuku’s endless neon mirage of bars, upscale boutiques and nightlife venues and Yoyogi Park’s shimmering lakes, there’s no better way to discover the true Tokyo. Sip espresso at NYC-style eatery The Jones Café | Bar or head out to experience Shinjuku’s legendary nightlife scene, including Golden Gai’s endless nostalgia-filled bars.
